nodes.title: Motion - Interactive components in Figma to create motion

nodes.excerpt: Prime 3.0 is the set of 7 Libraries for Sketch. It helps design UI much faster thanks to over 2,000 Components and 140 UI Templates (Web + Mobile) connected with 600+ Styles and Color Variables. Configure Prime within minutes and use Components within seconds.

nodes.title: Loom for Android - Mobile screen recordings with a cam bubble

nodes.excerpt: Tired of spending too much time in back-to-back meetings and lengthy chat discussions? Try Threadit -- short video recordings to show your work, connect your team, and get your day back. Get started at threadit.app or learn more at threadit.area120.com
nodes.title: Threadit by Google - Short video recordings for async collaboration
nodes.author: Keller Smith

nodes.excerpt: Big collection of elements for mind map and flowchart building. Create flowcharts and mind maps to follow the smartest way of dealing with big projects. Special for Figma.
nodes.title: Manifest Mind Maps and Flowcharts - 200+ elements for mind map and flowchart building

nodes.excerpt: Firework brings the TikTok/IG/Snap Story experience into any Website or any app. Raised $55M in Series A, we aim to unite the open internet (decentralized and open) to fight against the giant social media (centralized and closed)
nodes.title: Firework Web Story Platform - B2B Version of TikTok
nodes.author: Vincent Yang

nodes.excerpt: Fancy Widget is the ultimate widget App that can make your iPhone home screen look stunning. It starts with a wide collection of beautiful designed widgets, which range in function from clock, to weather, to calendar and step counting.
nodes.title: Fancy Widget - Create fancy widgets on iOS
nodes.author: Joshua Jian

nodes.excerpt: Bring your projects up to a whole new level using Artify's illustrations plugin, now available directly inside Figma. Through this new plugin you can search & import over 5000 illustrations with over 70 different design styles directly in your figma projects.
nodes.title: 5000+ illustrations for Figma by Artify - Figma plugin with 5000 illustrations in 70+ design styles
nodes.author: Juan Sarmiento

nodes.excerpt: The pack you've been looking for to bring your website or app to the next level. This pack contain 100 animated icons, rendered in svg, ready to be integrated to your website. The pack will be regularily updated with new versions of the icons to fit all your needs.
nodes.title: Iconimations - Svg animated icons pack, ready to be integrated to your site
nodes.author: Adrian Campagnolle

nodes.excerpt: You know how gradients are trendy, but adding a slight noise filter or grain to them is even trendier? Well now you don't have to crack open photoshop to get that effect with your own colors. Just go to noiseandgradient.com!
nodes.title: Noise and Gradient - Generate trendy textures of your own, for free

nodes.excerpt: VS Code Theme Studio enables you to quickly and easily design your own VS Code theme in an intuitive, user-friendly, web-based interface. No more messing around with nasty JSON files, editing raw hex color codes, and tweaking settings.
nodes.title: VS Code Theme Studio - Create your own VS Code theme easily, within your browser
